title: Blended Learning and Hybrid Autonomous Learning Design Based on Hybrid Pedagogy

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic learning theories and experience with digital learning tools
context.additional_context: A project-based education course combining blended learning and self-directed learning in smartphone-centric, limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain three core principles for designing blended learning models
Learners can design at least one personalized learning pathway applying the Zone of Proximal Development (ZPD) theory
Learners can prototype three types of microlearning content optimized for mobile environments
Learners can develop team-based rubrics to evaluate blended learning effectiveness and present implementation results

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
